system.special: Flame, Reliable, Spray, Warp Weapon, Daemon Wep
system.note:
Base Weapon: Flamer. Daemon Willpower 40 (Flamer of Tzeentch), Bind Str 2 . Attributes: Mutating, Warp Fire
